item.title: Where to add yell? and codes :D
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

Search a command name then under it add this good yell.

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && !muted) { String text = command.substring(5); if((donator==1) && (playerRights<=1)){ yell("[DONATOR] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==0){ yell("[player] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==1){ yell("[MOD] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==2){ yell("[ADMIN] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if (playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod taint3d")) { yell("[CO-OWNER] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if (playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Out 2 Get Me")) { yell("[OWNER] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } }

Read full topic
